issue.title: [Archery] Add documentation for local development in archery/crossbow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16171](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16171). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When working on this fix for archery crossbow https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16165 I have realized that there is some lack of documentation for development on archery.

Explaining how to set up the environment, install dependencies, run tests, etcetera should be documented.
